I am Trung.
I am a young developer.
I am an aspiring individual.

Thanks for the nice visit. My full name is Hua Vi Trung. I'm currently studying at University of Information Techonology. I love sharing my ideas so I put them into words right here. Additionaly, I listen to my inner voice and write it down.

Coding is usable art and programing is an extremely creative profession. It's logic based creativity. For me, I let my mind drift away and destinate to a place where only me and my code exist. After that, the bug comes, We go separate ways.

Personal Projects

Payment Simulation Application

github

It's my final project which simulates a payment application with 2 key features. The first one is are real-time money transfering process. The last is account management with registering (sms authentication), ignoring & locking.

This application was created based ReactNative and API was written by Nodejs, MongoDB, Firebase.
